name: bronnoysund-register-centre
title: Brønnøysundregistrene
description: Search Norwegian companies with comprehensive data from The Brønnøysund Register Centre.
author: vicjor

commands.name: search-companies
commands.title: Search Brønnøysundregistrene
commands.subtitle: Norwegian Company Registry
commands.description: Search Norwegian companies by name or organization number. View detailed business information including financial data, contact details, and company structure.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
